#summary How to help this project

= How to help this project =

If you want to help this project but not sure what you can do, choose one or more actions from list below:

  * *Starring* this project (click on star symbol located on [https://code.google.com/p/staff project's page]);
  * *+1* this project (click "g+1" button located on [https://code.google.com/p/staff project's page]);
  * Tell friends in your social network about this project;
  * [https://code.google.com/p/staff/issues/entry Submitting patch] that closes one of issues;
  * Writing and submitting test-cases;
  * Writing/improving Wiki manuals or translating manuals to your native language;
  * Other contributing into project - [https://code.google.com/u/112700498758556343339/ let me know] how can you help this project;
  * Or... maybe.. If you find this project useful and want to donate, please click [https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_donations&business=L9KHHG553AZ22&lc=US&item_name=wsf%2dstaff&currency_code=USD&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF%3abtn_donateCC_LG%2egif%3aNonHosted this link].
